errors.error_description: Pinned mysqlclient to a specific version without explaining compatibility requirements or supported version ranges
correction_candidates: Specify supported Python versions and compatible mysqlclient version ranges in the requirements section
Remove version pinning and let pip resolve compatible versions automatically
Add a compatibility matrix showing which versions work together
Use version ranges like mysqlclient>=2.0.0,<3.0.0 instead of exact pinning
errors.golden_answer: Remove version pinning and let pip resolve compatible versions automatically
